input.sentences: our vacation begins on gross public buses | but honestly it beats driving in unknown areas and getting lost | so here we go !
we stop off at the manly wharf | here you find many shops | cafes and diners .
we had a nice cup of coffee on the waterfront property | overlooking this gorgeous view .
in the distance there 's a tiny little lighthouse | slightly irrelevant to anything we did today | it just looked different so i wanted a picture !
after leaving the wharf we walked around location for the rest of the afternoon | such a lovely place | many beautiful sights to see . 10/10 would suggest !
output.sentences: Crossing the bridge on the way to the wharf.
We've arrived at the wharf, ready for some sight seeing.
Looking straight down into the water - scary!
We decided not to climb the tall tower to the light house.
A close up of a plant by the cliff.
